subject: Re: [junit] how to test private method with Junit?
msgSnippet: ... Please look for JUnit-addons class PrivilegedAccessor. You can find JUnit-addons at junit-addons.sourceforge.net. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger Diaspar
messageBody:
Mr 步者 慢 wrote:
>
> junit，您好！
>
> Is there anybody can give me a simple source & test
> files to demonstrate the private method testing?
> Thanks .
>
> 　　　　　　　　致

Please look for JUnit-addons class PrivilegedAccessor. You can find
JUnit-addons at junit-addons.sourceforge.net.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
